name: My Goddess is Upset (GMTK jam)
description:
"I am getting tired of all that drinking of yours! Weren't you supposed to be my hero?" 

Your Goddess is, well, upset with you, since all you do is going to bars to get wasted. Because of that, she's forced a challenge upon you: survive her tower, and she'll shower you in her protection once again. However, it's not gonna be easy...
"Oh, you like getting wasted, hmm? Let's see how you like losing control of your actions RIGHT NOW!"

With a temporary lack of ability to jump, move, or even see, survive her tower, avoid her divine retribution, and learn of this... or go back to your ways, if you'd like... it doesn't seem like a good idea, when divine retribution means a meteor to your face..

Controls:

- Movement: A, D or arrow keys

- Jump/Double Jump: Spacebar. (Hold to jump higher).

- Dash: Left Shift.

Indicators: (Random effects that take place during gameplay) Blocks Movement to the right: Blocks Movements to the left: Unable to Jump: Unable to Dash: - RAIN FROM ABOVE: Meteorites fall from the ceiling (Doesn't have an icon). - Blackout: The entire screen turns black for a short period of time (Doesn't have an icon). You can play the web version here:

https://yellowdtg.itch.io/my-goddess-is-upset
